fields.summary: Add missing metrics for document tiered storage
fields.description:
Add missing metrics for document tiered storage
 * 
kafka.log.remote:type=RemoteLogManager,name=RemoteLogReaderFetchRateAndTimeMs：Introduced in [KIP-1018|https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/KAFKA/KIP-1018%3A+Introduce+max+remote+fetch+timeout+config+for+DelayedRemoteFetch+requests]
 * 
kafka.server:type=DelayedRemoteListOffsetsMetrics,name=ExpiresPerSec,topic=([-.\w]+),partition=([0-9]+)：Introduced in [KIP-1075|https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/KAFKA/KIP-1075%3A+Introduce+delayed+remote+list+offsets+purgatory+to+make+LIST_OFFSETS+async]

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved
